summary: Comprehensive testing of EHSAS Alumni Society website completed. All major features tested including dynamic content rendering, admin functionality, and color scheme integration.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (16/16 tests passed)
Spotlight alumni CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Events CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Landing page loads with logo in hero and navbar
Color scheme verification (cardinal red, gold, cream - no blue/navy)
Dynamic spotlight section rendering (appears when data exists)
Dynamic events section rendering (hidden when no data)
All navigation buttons and links working
Conditional section rendering based on data availability
